DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , double-masked , 5-visit , bilateral dispensing , parallel group study demonstrate investigational contact lens meet design requirement related corneal staining , lens fit , visual acuity rotational performance well subjective comfort handle . Subjects wear contact lens total 28-36 day .
DOC.criteria: 1 ) Healthy adult male female age ≥1840 year age sign informed consent . 2 ) The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 3 ) Subject must habitual soft toric contact lens wearer . Habitual wearer define someone wear contact lenses least 6 hour day , 5 day week past 30 day . 4 ) Subject 's vertex correct spherical component distance refraction must 1.00 4.75 Diopter ( D ) ( inclusive ) eye . 5 ) Subject 's vertex correct refractive cylinder must 0.75 1.50 DC ( inclusive ) eye . 6 ) Subject 's refractive cylinder axis must 180±25 90±15 eye . 7 ) The subject must visual acuity best correctable 20/25 good eye 8 ) The subject must read sign Informed Consent form . 1 ) Women pregnant breastfeeding , 2 ) Any ocular systemic allergy disease may contraindicate contact lens wear . 3 ) Any ocular medication use within last one month . 4 ) Any systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . 5 ) Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV ) , selfreport . 6 ) Habitual wearer extend wear contact lens . 7 ) Known sensitivity Revitalens OcuTec® 8 ) Any previous history ocular and/or refractive surgery ( e.g. , radial keratotomy , PRK , LASIK , etc. ) . 9 ) A clinical finding history entropion , ectropion , extrusion , chalazia , recurrent stye , glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , aphakia , moderate corneal distortion , selfreport . 10 ) History binocular vision abnormality strabismus , selfreport . 11 ) Habitual wearer rigid gas permeable ( RGP ) lenses , orthokeratology lens , hybrid lens ( e.g . SynergEyes , SoftPerm ) within past 6 month . 12 ) Employee investigational clinic ( e.g. , Investigator , Coordinator , Technician ) . 13 ) Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 14 day prior study enrollment . 14 ) Clinically significant ( grade 3 high ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , bulbar injection abnormality would contraindicate contact lens wear . 15 ) Any history contact lensrelated corneal inflammatory event within past year may contraindicate contact lens wear . 16 ) Any active ocular infection . 17 ) Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . 18 ) Any fluctuation vision due clinically significant dry eye ocular condition .
